Description: Counter-serve bakery/cafe chain serving sandwiches, salads & more, known for its bread & free WiFi.

summary.snippet: "Good service and sandwiches, but iced green tea is really bad."
"Good breakfast I hope one day they can serve tomato soup in the morning"
"Cleanest salads and best creamy mac & cheese!"

most_relevant.description: In between of Barnes & Noble and Whole Food. Always people walking in and out. Restroom is somewhat clean

We waited 45 mins for the order just to be told it never came up on their screen so he weary of using the kiosk. Manager said it happens all the time, didn’t offer us a free treat or anything… the staff was really rude except for one girl who apologized. Just make sure you don’t rely on the beeper and make sure you see your name on their board! Bc you’ll get no sympathy from the manager. Idk if Donald was him or if that’s just who the register was under when the girl took our order.

I ordered my bagels last night, got an email saying my order is ready for pick up this morning. When i got there they stated that they didnt have the bagels i requested. They were sold out. WTH why did you send me an email stating its ready. This is the 2nd time this happened. I spoke to a lady named Emily and i ask for the GM name so I can ask to speak to him she said she couldnt give me his name. If you want good customer services and get the food you ordered, please stay away from this place. Very disappointing with the structure of this business. I wish i can give this place a rating lower than 1.
Food doesn’t match description. Burnt bread. Disappointing “sandwich” for $14.

Did a quick little stop to pick up some chicken noodle soup because I wasn’t feeling very well. Only for me me to find out when I came home that they scammed me with just the soup broth with no noodles or the vegetables and if I just needed the broth I could’ve just bought the chicken stock from the store!!!

I have gotten the strawberry poppy seed salad three times and every time there was little fruit in it. I mean 4 strawberries 4 blueberries! The price that they charge, there should be more fruit. I go to other Panera bread locations and there is a tone of fruit. Very disappointed.

Why do I even bother... went to this location because it was having a fundraiser for my school... second week in a row. Had a simple order, pizza and soda for now...half tuna and soup to go for tomorrow.  Showed the flier, shown in the picture below, and was told I was set.

Got to the back and everything was on a plater once finished and I stated that the sandwich and soup was to go, pizza was going to be ate at the location.  Young lady behind the counter found me annoying but slowly complied with my wished.  I then asked to make sure my school was credited the amount that me, and one of my students behind me, had spent for the fundraiser...I was quickly hit with that was only for orders.  I then showed the flier to the young lady and pointed out it said providing a copy in person was accepted...then was told the manager had to approve it.  The annoyed young lady then said to her coworker what a ****** I was...sorry for expecting things to be done right.  I stopped asking questions as I did not want to appear to be rude, remember I had students in the store.

I went to the table to eat my now cold pizza and have my soda. I had to use napkins and a sanitizer to clean my table. After clearing my table and cleaning it again for the next person, I said goodbye to my students and headed home.

Once home I deconstructed my sandwich... pictured below.  There was more veggies on the sandwich than tuna.  I am also trying to figure out why it had a slice of bacon as well.

Still not sure if the school will get any proceeds of mine or the students sales as that was never answered.  I work closely with the teacher who was having the fundraiser so I will be sharing this story with her as well.

They forgot both of my sides and the kiosk didn’t have large cups available, despite that being the size that I ordered. So I paid $30 for meals with no sides, no utensils, and the wrong size drink. Didn’t catch it until I was home because I was in a rush. It shouldn’t have happened anyways 🤷🏻‍♀️ Definitely not worth. Also the picture below is how my bowl came, not even filled up.
